name: Where's my dynoMITE?
description:
wasd to move the helicopter around

mouse click and hold to power up dynomite throw

mouse aim for dynomite throw

escape is pause menu.

to reset: pause, return to main menu, play 

dynomite only breaks cracked rocks

be careful and dont break the rope!

created by miej and skoobydoo for ludum dare 48

special thanks to ty for beta testing and brainstorming
